entry.summary: Reflection on The First Lesson of Science and Technology On Thursday, I learned with Mr. Jonathan who was a senior lecturer at RMIT Vietnam. For the whole lesson, I learned with a new classmate, his name is Long. Particularly, the main topic that I learned was an overview of Introduction to Science and Technology. In this topic, I learned about the bachelor of IT and Engineering, the informa...
